title: 05 - How to talk to God.
description:
So last week we talked about the Holy Spirit and this week we are going to talk about actually praying. On today's episode we are talking about the fact that most people say they pray and they actually don't. Let me ask you a question: "When is the last time you actually formed words to God?" If God is in control why do we pray?

Visit Audible.com/madeforthis or text madeforthis to 500-500 to start your free 30-day trial.
